markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hag Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=4535) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

When you came of age, your fingernails grew long and sharp. You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage. Your claws are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.

**Special** Hag claws can develop at any point in a changeling’s life. You can select this feat anytime you would gain an ancestry feat, but you can’t retrain out of it.
name: Hag Claws
